814730.name: Rogue Frontiers
814730.description:
Embark on a bone-chilling journey of survival and terror with your comrades, as you traverse a perilous realm filled with unfathomable horrors lurking in every corner. Brace yourself for heart-pumping battles against bloodthirsty beasts, honing your skills and mastering your craft to emerge victorious in the face of insurmountable odds.

With every step you take, you'll encounter diverse locales, each more treacherous than the last, and daunting obstacles that will test your mettle to the core. But you'll have no choice but to press on, constructing an unbreachable fortress to shield you from the darkness that threatens to consume you.

And yet, even your fortress may not be enough to withstand the unrelenting onslaught of your foes. You must hone your tactics, refine your strategy, and outwit the most cunning of enemies if you hope to survive.

In Rogue Frontiers, there is no room for error. Every decision you make could mean the difference between life and death. But with each victory, you'll grow stronger, more resilient, and better equipped to face the next challenge.

And with frequent updates featuring bug fixes, balance adjustments, and fresh content drops, Rogue Frontiers is an ever-evolving nightmare, where your feedback and input will help shape the future of the game. So join the fray now, and leave your mark on the annals of horror gaming forever. But be warned: once you enter, there may be no escape.

EXPLORE THE WORLD

Unleash your sense of adventure and step into a world steeped in mystery and intrigue. Explore a vast and varied landscape, brimming with dangerous foes to conquer, precious resources to gather, and hidden secrets to uncover.

Prepare to battle bloodthirsty monsters at every turn, as you journey through treacherous terrain, encountering unique adversaries with their own deadly abilities and cunning tactics. Only the bravest and most skilled adventurers will survive the perils that lie ahead.

But the greatest rewards await those who dare to venture into the most perilous dungeons, facing the most challenging creatures in their quest for glory. These ancient, labyrinthine tombs are filled with untold riches, rare artifacts, and coveted crafting recipes, but they are also home to the deadliest monsters in the land.

Surviving these harrowing encounters will require every ounce of skill and strategy you possess, as you adapt to ever-changing circumstances and employ every weapon in your arsenal. Only those with the courage and fortitude to persevere will emerge victorious, earning their place among the greatest adventurers of all time.

So prepare to immerse yourself in a world of endless possibility, where danger and reward go hand in hand. Gather your wits, arm yourself to the teeth, and embark on a journey unlike any other. The fate of the realm rests in your hands.

DEFEND YOUR STRONGHOLD
Forge unbreakable fortresses, the last bastion of hope in a world teeming with danger and chaos. With a comprehensive building system, you can personalize both the interior and exterior of your structures, creating a safe haven from the perils that lie ahead.

But it won't be easy. As you advance through building tiers, enhancing and expanding your stronghold, you'll have to stay one step ahead of the hostile Horde, who launch regular assaults on your base.

To fend off these relentless attackers, you'll need to construct traps and defensive structures that will keep them at bay. Every decision you make could mean the difference between life and death, so you'll need to employ all your ingenuity and strategic thinking to survive.

But the rewards are worth the risk. With every upgrade to your fortress, you'll become stronger, more resilient, and better able to withstand the onslaught of your enemies. And as you progress through the game, you'll unlock new and more powerful building options, allowing you to customize your stronghold to suit your playstyle.

So gather your materials, fire up your imagination, and set to work building the ultimate fortress. The Horde may be relentless, but with the right combination of traps and defensive structures, you can hold them off indefinitely. Do you have what it takes to survive in this hostile world? The fate of your fortress, and your survival, rests in your hands.

GATHER, CRAFT AND SURVIVE
Survival is the name of the game in this harsh and unforgiving world, and you'll need all your wits and resourcefulness to make it through each day. Collect materials from the environment and fashion them into weapons, armor, tools, and defenses that will help you stay alive and fend off the dangers that lurk around every corner.

But survival isn't just about brute strength and firepower. You'll need to be able to cultivate crops and vegetables, cook food, concoct drinks and potions, and upgrade your living space to create a safe and comfortable haven in this hostile world.

As you progress through the game, you'll face more formidable foes, and you'll need to discover new items to craft in order to stay ahead of the game. With each new challenge you overcome, you'll gain experience and become more skilled at gathering, crafting, and surviving.

But be warned: the challenges will be many, and the stakes will be high. You'll need to be able to adapt quickly to changing circumstances and make split-second decisions that could mean the difference between life and death.

So strap on your boots, grab your tools, and get ready for an unparalleled experience of gathering, crafting, and survival. This world is unforgiving, but with the right combination of skill, luck, and determination, you just might make it out alive.

KEY FEATURES:
  • Venture forth into an enormous, meticulously crafted world where every locale boasts a distinct ambience, unique foes, and resources.
  • Embark on your odyssey solo or team up with up to 32 players on player-hosted servers and brace yourself for scaling enemy difficulty.
  • Explore extraordinary biomes, each offering its own special ingredients to gather, monsters to battle, and dungeons to delve into.
  • Indulge in a highly detailed crafting system where you can hone your skills and create hundreds of items, unlocking endless possibilities.
  • Choose from dozens of weapons and armor types, progressing through various tiers as you journey through the world.
  • Immerse yourself in stamina-based combat that rewards preparation and skill. Utilize weapon types with unique attacks, different blocking styles, ranged combat, dodges, and parries to combat your enemies.
  • Fuel your adventure with a rewarding food system where you gain health, stamina, and regeneration buffs depending on the foods you consume.
  • Experience a flexible building system that takes structural integrity into account, allowing you to create anything from a small shelter to an entire village, claim abandoned buildings as your own, and customize them to your liking.
  • Protect your base from the Horde, who will launch attacks on all your bases. Or, make sacrifices to them beforehand and they will skip an attack, adding a whole new level of strategic gameplay. Get ready for the ultimate survival adventure!
